grounding:
This conversation with Sir Partha Dasgupta, moderated by Annual Review of Economics Editorial Commitee Member Tim Besley, focuses on biodiversity and its implications for economic thought and policy. A video of this interview is available online at 
https://www.annualreviews.org/r/partha_dasgupta_interview
.
generated_text: This article presents a dialogue with economist Sir Partha Dasgupta on biodiversity's role in economic theory. It explores the intersection of biodiversity, growth, and development, emphasizing inclusive wealth and asset management approaches to address environmental challenges in economic frameworks.
